channel.title: Long Creek|Grant County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Long Creek|Grant County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek
item.description: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek. Turn left for US-395 north to Ukiah and Pendleton. Turn left for US-395 south to Fox and John Day.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-402 West
item.description: US-395 south at OR-402 west to Hamilton, Monument, and Kimberly. Turn left for forest road east to Galena on the Middle Fork John Day River.

item.title: US-395 South - Mile 90 B
item.description: Milepost 90 (B) on US-395 south. The B is because the state of Oregon maintains different internal highways along the state highway system. Some of the signed highways (like US-395) span multiple internal highways. In this case this is the second internal highway south from the Washington border that belongs only to US-395. The first (Umatilla-Stanfield #54) is marked as an A on mileposts. This is the second (B) stretch - Pendleton - John Day #28).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-402
item.description: US-395 South approaching OR-402 in Long Creek. Use OR-402 west for Monument and Kimberly.

item.title: US-395 South - Entering Long Creek
item.description: Entering Long Creek on US-395 south.
